```{r}
data1 <- scan(file="TLEN.txt", what="integer")
data1 <- as.numeric(data1)
vector = c()
p05 = quantile(data1, probs = .05)
p95 = quantile(data1, probs = .95)
for (a in data1) {
  if (a<p95&a>p05) {
    vector <- c(vector, a)
  }
}
hist(vector, main = "Distribution of Insert Length", breaks = 100, xlab = "Insert Length (bp)", xlim = c(0, 500))
```
